overview: Filmed at iconic venue The Gilded Balloon as part of Tommyâ€™s month long run at the Edinburgh Comedy Festival 2016. As always his performance mesmerises in a way that is joyful, uplifting, inspirational and most importantly always breathtakingly funny.
